text: Derek O'Brien (born 11 September 1957) is a retired Irish footballer who played in the League of Ireland in the 1980s. ==Honours== *FAI Cup ** Dundalk F.C. ==References== * The Hoops by Paul Doolan and Robert Goggins () Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Irish footballers Category:Sportspeople from Dublin
title: Derek O'Brien (footballer, born 1957)
